games.longDescription: Strong racing cars, detailed modification options, and tough races are waiting for you with the Grand City Racing game! There are three game modes: Racing, Challenge, and Free Drive. You can play single-player or two-player. How to play? Single-player: Move: "W,A,S,D" or "ARROW KEYS" NOS: "F" Look back: "T" Fix car's position: "R" Handbrake: "SPACE" Two-player: Player 1: Move: "W,A,S,D" NOS: "F" Look back: "T" Fix car's position: "R" Handbrake: "SPACE" Player 2: Move: "ARROW KEYS" NOS: "K" Look back: "L" Fix car's position: "O" Handbrake: "RIGHT-SHIFT" In Racing mode, there are ten races with varying rewards. Challenge mode has four time-attack races. Free Drive mode features a large map with stunt ramps, money stacks, circles, and mountain roads. In the garage, you can customize your car's paint, rims, decals, and upgrade engine parts for better performance. Have fun!
games.shortDescription: Grand City Racing is a racing games that offers High Quality car racing it has 3 modes Racing, Challange, Free drive.
games.title: Grand City Racing

games.longDescription: Hazmob FPS is an action-packed tactical war game that has also been released on mobile platforms. Each player can create their own strategy and join battles with their team in various game modes. An immersive FPS gaming experience awaits you with realistic game mechanics, graphic style, and a competitive ranking system. How to play? Single-player: Movement: "W,A,S,D" Jump: "SPACE" Shoot: "LEFT-MOUSE" AIM: "RIGHT-MOUSE" Leaderboard, pause, and settings: "P" Pick up the gun: "G" Crouch: "C" Run: "SHIFT" Switch weapons: "1,2,3" Skills: "4,5,6" Alternative skills: "E" Alternative skills: "Q" Take your place in the team and start the fight!
games.shortDescription: Hazmob FPS is an intense first-person shooter that blends tactical depth with fast-paced action
games.title: Hazmob FPS

games.longDescription: Temple Run 2 is an endless running adventure game where you must escape from a cursed idol while avoiding obstacles, cliffs, and traps. Test your reflexes as you run, jump, slide, and turn across dangerous paths. Collect coins, unlock characters, and activate special powers to go further in your escape. How far can you run before getting caught? How to play? Single-player: Move Left: "Left Arrow" or "Swipe Left" Move Right: "Right Arrow" or "Swipe Right" Jump: "Up Arrow" or "Swipe Up" Slide: "Down Arrow" or "Swipe Down" Activate Power: "Spacebar" or "Click Power Icon"
games.shortDescription: Temple Run 2 is a thrilling endless runner where you dodge obstacles, collect coins, and escape danger
games.tags: endless, runner, arcade, pc, embedded, gamemonetize.com
games.title: Temple Run 2
